DOC.brief_title: Neurophysiology Surround Inhibition Human Motor Cortex
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : The purpose protocol improve understanding neurophysiological mechanism underlie phenomenon surround inhibition human motor cortex . It known patient focal hand dystonia abnormal motor surround inhibition . However , physiology phenomenon still remain unclear . The 2 sub-studies propose protocol integrate several neurophysiological technique explore different aspect motor surround inhibition . The objective sub-study 1 ( ) identify EEG correlate motor SI ( b ) determine relationship short interval intracortical inhibition ( SICI ) SI , compromise patient FHD ( c ) determine oscillatory frequency band relevant SI . The result sub-study shed light inhibitory mechanisms critical motor SI . Sub-study 2 aim determine influence parietal conditioning motor surround inhibition . If conditioning parietal cortex enhances SI , conclude parieto-motor inhibitory network may involve motor SI network could affect focal hand dystonia . Study population : We intend study 52 healthy volunteer total . Up 17 participant recruit sub-study 1 35 sub-study 2 . Design : Sub-study 1 : This exploratory study . Participants perform auditory cue index finger movement task motor evoke potential elicit stimulate motor hotspot surround muscle use transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) . EEG record continuously . Single pair TMS pulse ( postero-anterior antero-posterior current ) deliver either subject rest movement onset . TMS-evoked potential ( TEPs ) obtain time-locked averaging trial condition . The amplitudes different peak TEP compare across condition may correlate degree SI SICI . The component TEP relevant motor SI thus identify . Sub-study 2 : This hypothesis-driven study . Our primary hypothesis parietal condition influence motor SI healthy volunteer . Participants perform auditory cue index finger movement task motor evoke potential elicit stimulate motor hotspot surround muscle use transcranial magnetic stimulation . Two coil , one position motor cortex inhibitory region inferior parietal lobule , deliver TMS pulse fix inter-stimulus interval . The pulse deliver either subject rest movement onset . The ratio mean MEP amplitude obtain parietal conditioning obtain motor cortex stimulation alone movement onset reveal parieto-motor influence SI . Outcome measure : For sub-study 1 , outcome measure ( 1 ) amplitude different TEP peak ( 2 ) degree surround inhibition short interval intracortical inhibition ( 3 ) correlation relevant peak amplitude ( 4 ) power cortico-cortical coherence different frequency band . MEP amplitude primary outcome measure sub-study 2 .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Age 18 70 year . Righthanded ( test Edinburg handedness inventory ) . Able give inform consent . Able comply study procedure . Abstain alcohol least 48 hr prior study caffeine day study ( base oral interview ) . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Illegal drug use within past 6 month base history alone . The intent exclude drug use may affect study result . Selfreported consumption > 14 alcoholic drinks/week man > 7 alcoholic drinks/week woman . Abnormal finding neurological examination . History current brain tumor , stroke , head trauma loss consciousness , epilepsy seizure . Current episode major depression major psychiatric illness . Taking medication act directly central nervous system antiepileptic , antihistamine , antiparkinsonian medication , muscle relaxant , medication insomnia , antidepressant , antianxiety medication . Presence metal eye skull area brain stimulator , shrapnel , surgical metal , clip brain , cochlear implant , metal fragment eye . Presence pacemaker , intracardiac line , implant pump stimulators metal object inside eye skull . Known hearing loss . NIH employee and/or staff . Pregnancy EXCLUSION CRITERIA MRI ( substudy 2 ) : We follow Clinical Radiology/NMR Center guideline MR safety . Some exclusion : Have nonMRI compatible metal body , cardiac pacemaker , brain stimulator , shrapnel , surgical metal , clip brain blood vessel , cochlear implant , artificial heart valve metal fragment eye make MRI unsafe .
